Sure is the first one who let firstly he had a Machinery Machinery. Okay in Europe, we don't have many.
Cause like in his ship ship. Okay what he did he stopped here in this like we have small Here, okay, he spread Christianity. It has He were there. Okay talking with them mean like firstly he gave them the language. Okay, firstly the the People by the coast the coast of Atlantic Ocean Atlantic Ocean. Okay, so he tried to talk to them in their languages. They can't they didn't respond to.
He was talking to them using his hands. His tongue is mimics. Okay, because there is no there is no common language between that common language between them. So he personally made. By these people by the course in order to speak Portugal
trans:
Claro que es el primero en permitirlo, en primera instancia. Tenía una maquinaria. Bueno, en Europa, no tenemos muchas.
Porque, como en su barco. Lo que hizo fue detenerse aquí, en este pequeño lugar, para difundir el cristianismo. Él estaba allí. Hablando con ellos, primero les proporcionó el idioma. En primer lugar, a la gente de la costa del Océano Atlántico. OK, entonces, él trató de hablar con ellos en sus idiomas. Ellos no podían, no le respondían.
Él les hablaba usando las manos. Su idioma era la mímica. OK, porque no existe un idioma común entre ellos. Así que él personalmente lo creó. Por estas personas, por el curso, con el fin de hablar, Portugal
